author: CMSTrackerDPG
body:
#### PR description:

There is a standing plan to move the strip hit efficiency analysis to DQM (either at PCL, or in standard DQM), so that the creation of custom SiStrip calibration trees could be finally relinquished for Run-3.
This PR collects the commits available so far in order to move on with the integration. It's still WIP and it's being opened in order to start collecting the feedback from reviewers.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N.A.

cc:
@robervalwalsh @mdelcourt @sroychow @cms-sw/trk-dpg-l2
title: [WIP] Strip Hit Efficiency from DQM: first push
